verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Messenger of Allah.
Peace be upon you, O Prophet of Allah.

verses.text: السلام عليك يا أمير المؤمنين سيد الوصيين
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Commander of the Faithful, the leader of the successors.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Amir al-Mu'mineen Sayid al-Waseen

verses.text: السلام عليك يا فاطمة الزهراء سيدة نساء العالمين
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Fatimah al-Zahra, the leader of the women of the worlds.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Fatimatuz Zahra Sayyidat Nisa'il Alameen

verses.text: السلام عليك يا خديجة الكبرى أم المؤمنين
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Khadijah al-Kubra, the mother of the believers.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Khadijat al-Kubra Umm al-Mu'mineen

verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Hasan al-Mujtaba.

verses.text: السلام عليك يا أبا عبد الله الحسين وعلى الأرواح التي حلت بفنائك
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O Aba Abdillah al-Husayn, and upon the souls that stayed in your courtyard.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Aba Abdillah al-Husayn wa 'ala al-arwah alati hallat bifina'ik

verses.text: عليكم مني جميعاً سلام الله أبداً ما بقيت وبقي الليل والنهار ولا جعله الله آخر العهد مني لزيارتكم
verses.translation: Peace be upon you from me forever, as long as I remain and as long as there are night and day. And may Allah not make it the last covenant from me to visit you.
verses.transliteration: 'Alaykum minni jamee'an salamu Allahi abadan ma baqeetu wa baqiya allayl wa annahar wa la ja'alahu Allahu akhira al-'ahdi minni li ziyaratikum.

verses.translation: Peace be upon al-Husayn,
And upon Ali ibn al-Husayn,
And upon the children of al-Husayn,
And upon the companions of al-Husayn.

verses.text: وعلى أخيك العباس، باب الحوائج مختار زينب وأم كلثوم وبنتك سكينة
verses.translation: And upon your brother al-Abbas, the door of needs, the supporter of Zaynab and Umm Kulthum, and your daughter Sakina.
verses.transliteration: Wa 'ala Akhik al-Abbas, Bab al-Hawa'ij Mukhtar Zainab wa Umm Kulthum wa Bintika Sakina

verses.text: السلام عليكم جميعاً شهداء كربلاء ورحمة الله وبركاته
verses.translation: Peace be upon you all, O martyrs of Karbala, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alaykum jami'an shuhada Karbala wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh

verses.text: السلام عليك يا تسعة المعصومين من ذرية الحسين
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O nine Imams from the progeny of al-Husayn,
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya tis'at al-ma'sumeen min dhurriyat al-Husayn

verses.translation: Ali ibn al-Husayn Zain al-Abidin,
And Muhammad ibn Ali al-Baqir,
And Ja'far ibn Muhammad al-Sadiq,
And Musa ibn Ja'far al-Kazim,
And Ali ibn Musa al-Ridha,
And Muhammad ibn Ali al-Jawad,
And Ali ibn Muhammad al-Hadi,
And Hasan ibn Ali al-Askari.

verses.text: السلام عليك يا مولاي يا صاحب العصر والزمان
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O my master, O the Master of the Age and Time,
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Mawla ya Sahib al-Asr wa al-Zaman

verses.text: سيدي الأمان الأمان الأمان من فتنة الزمان
verses.translation: My leader, safety, safety, safety from the trials of time.
verses.transliteration: Sayyidi al-amana al-amana al-amana min fitnat al-zaman

verses.text: السلام عليك يا حجة الله في أرضه
verses.translation: Peace be upon you, O proof of Allah on His earth.
verses.transliteration: As-salamu alayka ya Hujjat Allah fi ardihee

verses.text: عجل الله فرجك وسهل الله مخرجك وظهورك
verses.translation: May Allah hasten your reappearance and make easy your emergence and your appearance.
verses.transliteration: Ajjal Allahu farajak wa sahhal Allahu makhrajaka wa dhuhurak

verses.translation: And the mercy of Allah and His blessings.
